mapper.select: select book.book_no, book.title, book.img_path, book.running_time, author.name, library.progress,book.buyLink from author, book,library where book.author_no=author.author_no and book.book_no IN ( select book_no from library where user_no=#{user_no}) and library.book_no = book.book_no and user_no=#{user_no}
select book_no from library where user_no=(select user_no from user where email=#{email})
mapper.delete: delete from library where user_no=#{user_no} and book_no=#{book_no}
